Connected Tools: 1. **Tesla Financial Market Data Analyst Tool** - Aggregates multi-timeframe indicators + candlestick signals from: â€¢ Tesla 15min Indicators Tool â€¢ Tesla 1h Indicators Tool â€¢ Tesla 1d Indicators Tool â€¢ Tesla Klines Tool (1h & 1d pattern/volume) - Uses Alpha Vantage indicators: **RSI, BBANDS, SMA, EMA, ADX, MACD** - Each tool returns the **20 most recent points**, cleaned and trimmed - Pattern logic: detects **Doji, Engulfing**, and **volume divergence** 2. **Tesla News and Sentiment Analyst Tool** - Scrapes from trusted RSS sources: **Google News, Yahoo Finance, Electrek, CleanTechnica, TeslaNorth** - Returns: â€¢ **Sentiment score**: Bullish / Bearish / Neutral â€¢ **Summary**: 2â€“3 sentence narrative â€¢ **Top 3â€“5 Headlines** (with sources) --- ### ğŸ“Š Responsibilities: 1. **Ingest structured inputs** from the tools listed above: - Indicator values and candlestick/volume behavior - News sentiment summaries and headlines 2. **Perform technical analysis** across timeframes: - **Short-Term**: 15m + 1h - **Long-Term**: 1d + 1h - Assess trend, support/resistance, divergence, and reversal signals - Confirm with lagging indicators and macro sentiment alignment 3. **Generate two trade strategy sections**: Spot Recommendations â€¢ Action: Buy / Sell / Hold â€¢ Entry Price â€¢ Stop Loss â€¢ Take Profit â€¢ Rationale: â€ƒ- Primary Signals: e.g. candle pattern, breakout â€ƒ- Lagging Indicators: RSI, BBANDS, etc. â€ƒ- Sentiment & Macro Analysis: use news summary + headlines Leveraged Recommendations â€¢ Position: Long / Short â€¢ Leverage: 2x / 3x / 5x â€¢ Entry Price â€¢ Stop Loss â€¢ Take Profit â€¢ Rationale: â€ƒ- Primary Price Action Signals â€ƒ- Lagging Indicator Confirmation â€ƒ- Sentiment & Macro Analysis 4. **Score your signal strength** â€¢ Confidence score (0â€“100) â€¢ Strength label: Low / Medium / High / Very High 5. **Include sentiment and headlines** at the bottom of the report: â€¢ A short News Sentiment Summary â€¢ Top 3 Tesla-related headlines with bullet formatting --- ### ğŸ§¾ Output Format (Telegram HTML) Start your message with: TSLA Analysis Use: â€¢ `` for bold headers â€¢ `â€¢` for bullet points â€¢ Clean line breaks --- âš ï¸ DO NOT: â€¢ Fabricate or assume any data â€¢ Repeat this prompt or system instructions â€¢ Include raw JSON or raw API format in your output Only use what is provided via structured input. "},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"8e2ebe09-5488-4fb9-8175-b88ba68fcb9e","name":"Sticky Note11","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[1900,-1680],"parameters":{"width":1280,"height":2300,"content":" # ğŸ§  Tesla Quant Trading AI Agent â€“ Full System Documentation A professional-grade AI-driven stock analysis system designed to deliver structured Tesla (TSLA) swing-trading insights based on real-time technical indicators and sentiment signals. --- ## ğŸ§© Included Workflows > Download and install **all** of the following workflows for the system to function correctly. | Workflow Name | Function | | ------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | | âœ… Tesla 15min Indicators Tool | Pulls Alpha Vantage data for short-term signals (15m: RSI, BBANDS, etc.) | | âœ… Tesla 1hour Indicators Tool | Pulls Alpha Vantage data for medium-term signals (1h: RSI, BBANDS, etc.) | | âœ… Tesla 1day Indicators Tool | Pulls Alpha Vantage data for long-term signals (1d: RSI, BBANDS, MACD) | | âœ… Tesla 1hour & 1day Klines Tool | Analyzes candlestick patterns and volume divergences (OHLCV) | | âœ… Tesla Quant Technical Indicators Webhooks | Webhook handlers that power the above 4 indicator-fetching tools | | âœ… Tesla Financial Market Data Analyst Tool | Synthesizes multi-timeframe indicator + candle data | | âœ… Tesla News and Sentiment Analyst Tool | Scrapes Tesla news RSS + assigns sentiment with headlines | | âœ… Tesla Quant Trading AI Agent | Final agent that generates Telegram-style trade reports | --- ## âš™ï¸ Installation Instructions ### Step 1: Import Workflows 1. Open your **n8n editor UI**. 2. Import each workflow JSON file one by one. 3. Make sure all workflows are **activated** or properly linked via `Execute Workflow` nodes. ### Step 2: Set Up Credentials 1. Go to **Credentials â†’ HTTP Auth â†’ Query Parameter Auth**. 2. Create a credential named: `Alpha Vantage Premium` * Add: `apikey=YOUR_API_KEY` 3. Add your **OpenAI API** credentials (for GPT-4.1 or equivalent). ### Step 3: Configure Webhooks 1. Deploy the **Tesla Quant Technical Indicators Webhooks Tool**. 2. Ensure that `/15minData`, `/1hourData`, `/1dayData`, and `/klinesData` routes are properly reachable. ### Step 4: Set Up Execution 1. Trigger the **Tesla Quant Trading AI Agent** manually or via a scheduler. 2. The agent will: * Call all technical + sentiment tools via workflow execution * Format and analyze data * Output full trading report in Telegram-HTML style --- ## ğŸ–¥ï¸ System Overview **Data Flow:** ``` [Webhook HTTP Trigger] â†’ [Indicator Tool (15m, 1h, 1d)] â†’ [Candlestick Tool (1h, 1d)] â†’ [Financial Market Data Analyst] â†’ [Sentiment Analyst] â†’ [Final Report Generator] ``` **Output Example:** * Spot + Leverage trade entries * Confidence score (0â€“100) * Reasoning: price action, indicators, and sentiment * Summary headlines and sentiment context --- ## ğŸ“¬ Output Format * Styled using Telegram HTML (``, `â€¢`, newlines) * Structured trade report with: * Action type * Entry/exit prices * Rationale in 3 parts * News sentiment and 3 headlines --- ## ğŸš€ Support & Licensing ğŸ”— **Don Jayamaha â€“ LinkedIn** [http://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr](http://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr) Â© 2025 Treasurium Capital Limited Company. All rights reserved. This AI workflow architecture, including logic, design, and prompt structures, is the intellectual property of **Treasurium Capital Limited Company**. Unauthorized reproduction, redistribution, or resale is prohibited under **U.S. copyright law**. Licensed use only. readme:
ğŸ“ˆ **Get daily and on-demand Tesla (TSLA) trading signals via Telegramâ€”powered by GPT-4.1 and real-time market data.**  
This is the central AI supervisor that orchestrates seven sub-agents for technical analysis, price pattern recognition, and news sentiment. Reports are delivered in structured Telegram-ready HTML, optimized for traders seeking fast, intelligent decision-making signals.

âš ï¸ This master agent **requires 7 connected sub-workflows** to function. One of them, the News & Sentiment Agent, also requires a **DeepSeek Chat API key** for language processing.

* * *

## ğŸ”Œ Required Sub-Workflows

You must download and publish the following workflows:

  1. **[Tesla Financial Market Data Analyst Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/XXXX)**
  2. **[Tesla News and Sentiment Analyst Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/YYYY)** _(Requires DeepSeek Chat API Key)_
  3. **[Tesla 15min Indicators Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/ZZZZ)**
  4. **[Tesla 1hour Indicators Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/AAAA)**
  5. **[Tesla 1day Indicators Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/BBBB)**
  6. **[Tesla 1hour& 1day Klines Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/CCCC)**
  7. **[Tesla Quant Technical Indicators Webhooks Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/DDDD)** _(Requires Alpha Vantage Premium API Key)_



ğŸ“ See all tools at:  
ğŸ”— **<https://n8n.io/creators/don-the-gem-dealer/>**

* * *

## ğŸ” What This Agent Does

  1. Listens to your trading query via Telegram

  2. Calls the **Financial Analyst** and **News & Sentiment Analyst**

  3. These agents aggregate:

     * RSI, MACD, BBANDS, SMA, EMA, ADX
     * Candlestick pattern + volume divergence analysis
     * News summaries and sentiment scoring via **DeepSeek Chat**
  4. GPT-4.1 composes the final structured **TSLA trade report** with:

     * Spot and leverage setups
     * Signal rationale
     * Confidence score
     * Sentiment tag
     * News summary



* * *

## ğŸ§  Output Example

**TSLA Trading Report (Daily Summary)**  
**Spot Trade**  
â€¢ Action: Buy  
â€¢ Entry: 172.45  
â€¢ TP: 182.00  
â€¢ SL: 169.80  
â€¢ Signal: RSI bounce + Bullish Engulfing  
â€¢ Sentiment: Neutral

**Leveraged Position**  
â€¢ Position: Long  
â€¢ Leverage: 3x  
â€¢ TP: 186  
â€¢ SL: 170  
â€¢ Confidence: High (83/100)

ğŸ“° **Top News**  
â€¢ Tesla Model Y delivery surge â€“ Electrek  
â€¢ Options market pricing in upside â€“ Bloomberg  
â€¢ FSD delayed in Canada â€“ TeslaNorth

* * *

## ğŸ› ï¸ Setup Instructions

### 1\. Import All 8 Workflows

Ensure all sub-agents above are published in your n8n instance.

### 2\. Create Your Telegram Bot

Use [@BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather) to generate the token and connect to the trigger/send nodes.

### 3\. Connect OpenAI GPT-4.1

Add your OpenAI credentials for GPT-4.1 in the designated node.

### 4\. Add DeepSeek Chat API Key

Sign up at <https://deepseek.com> and insert your **DeepSeek Chat** credentials in the News Agent.

### 5\. Add Alpha Vantage Premium API Key

Sign up at <https://www.alphavantage.co/premium/>  
Use HTTP Header Auth for webhook-based indicator fetchers.

### 6\. Replace Telegram ID

Update the placeholder <<replace your ID here>> with your actual Telegram numeric ID in the auth node.

* * *

## ğŸ“Œ Included Sticky Notes

âœ… Telegram Bot Setup  
âœ… Agent Routing & Memory  
âœ… Financial vs. Sentiment Trigger Flow  
âœ… Report Formatting (HTML)  
âœ… API Requirements (GPT-4.1, DeepSeek, Alpha Vantage)  
âœ… Troubleshooting & Licensing

* * *

## ğŸ§¾ Licensing & Attribution

Â© 2025 **Treasurium Capital Limited Company**  
Architecture, prompts, and trade report structure are IP-protected. No unauthorized rebranding permitted.

ğŸ”— For support: [LinkedIn â€“ Don Jayamaha](https://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr)

* * *

ğŸš€ **Deploy the Tesla Quant Trading AI system with GPT-4.1, DeepSeek Chat, and Alpha Vantage Premiumâ€”right into Telegram.**  
**All 8 workflows are required.**
